name: PixARK
description: Enter a world of mystery, danger, ancient dinosaurs, mythical beasts, and cubes! Work by yourself or with a tribe of others to gather materials, craft useful items, tame wild creatures, and build huge bases to survive in PixARK!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
